activities: We utilize information collected for market research purposes to report on market trends and needs across a broad population.  We are not interested in information specific to the individual. The information is combined with others to derive trends.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Self-certification using the U.S. Government Workbook
recoursemech: We will comply with regulatory supervisory authorities that provide for handling of individual complaints and dispute resolution (EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)).
